item.title: Pentacle Memo Issued
item.description: Written by Battelle Memorial Institute to delay meeting of Robertson Panel to allow more time for statistical analysis. Authored by Dr Howard C Cross. https://thinkaboutit.site/ufos/a-missing-pentacle/ http://cufon.org/cufon/pentacle.htm https://www.ufoexplorations.com/roswell-debris-confirmed-as-et
